#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	int b;
	int d;
	int temp;
	int iter;
	int last;
	int count;

	cin >> t;

	while (t--) {
		cin >> b;

		bool dist[b];

		for (int i = 0; i < b; i++) {
			dist[i] = 0;
		}
		
		iter = 1;
		count = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < b; i++) {
			if (!dist[i]) {
				dist[i] = true;
				count++;
				last = i;
				d = i + 1;

				while (d < b) {
					temp = iter;
					
					while (temp && d < b) {
						if (!dist[d++]) {
							temp--;
						}
					}
					while (dist[d] && d < b) {
						d++;
					}
					if (!temp && d < b) {
						dist[d] = true;
						count++;
						last = d;
						d++;
					}
				}
				iter++;
			}
			if (count == b) {
				break;
			}
		}

		cout << last + 1 << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
